titles: Characters vpon essaies morall, and diuine written for those good spirits, that will take them in good part, and make vse of them to good purpose.
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: Printed by Edw. Griffin, for Iohn Gwillim, and are to be sold at his shop in Britaines-Burse,
notes: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: Charactering of essayes.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library (reel 629) and Harvard University Library (reel 1942).
keywords: Characters and characteristics --  Early works to 1800.
